bike.description: Specialized E5 aluminum, fully manipulated tubing, smooth weld, compact race design, 1-1/2" lower bearing, integrated headset, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon, full monocoque, OS race for 1-1/2" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated, w/ headset, 20mm cone spacer, w/ 20mm of spacers
Specialized EliteSet, 3D forged alloy, 12-degree, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt, 31.8mm clamp
Nylon flat test ride, loose ball, w/ reflectors
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, 127 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Specialized Turbo Pro w/ BlackBelt, 127 TPI, aramid bead, 700x23c
Body Geometry Romin Comp, hollow Cr-Mo rails
Chainstay protector, chain catcher, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
